definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: We expect yield curves to steepen significantly over the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 我們預計收益率曲線將在中期顯著變陡。

sentences.english: In the case of a company higher retained earnings will result in a lower dividend paid out to shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 在如此高的公司將被調低留存收益發放股利給股東。

sentences.english: Clearly this was a profitable happenstance for both the owners and the king.
sentences.chinese: 顯然後者對於農場主和國王來說都是收益頗豐的驚喜。

sentences.english: Excluding the effects of one-time gains, operating losses were pared 32 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 扣除一次性收益影響，該業務營運虧損縮減32%。

sentences.english: They all have costs as well as benefits.
sentences.chinese: 它們的成本和收益各半。

sentences.english: Certain taxes may be exempted or reduced when they begin to earn a specified amount of profits .
sentences.chinese: 取得一定收益後，可以免徵或者減徵有關稅收。

sentences.english: Bank of China's subprime exposure significantly hurt the pace of earnings growth last year.
sentences.chinese: 中國銀行的次債風險極大地損害了其去年的收益增長。

sentences.english: It's now expecting fiscal-year results at the lower end of expectations.
sentences.chinese: 目前預計本財年公司收益將處在預測區間的低端。

sentences.english: Already the press of arousal , can not achieve symbolistic earnings only readily.
sentences.chinese: 已經覺醒的出版社，並不甘心只能獲得象徵性的收益。

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，長期債券的收益要高於短期債券。

sentences.english: Diminishing marginal returns are like pickingapples.
sentences.chinese: 邊際收益遞減像摘蘋果。

sentences.english: Focus on the certifications that give you the most bang for the buck.
sentences.chinese: 將注意力放在那些能夠帶給你最大收益的認證上。

sentences.english: The sartorial shift has translated into sales gains for top brands.
sentences.chinese: 這一趨勢的轉變已轉化爲頂級品牌的銷售收益。

sentences.english: Gains are realized when assets are liquidated to cash.
sentences.chinese: 當資產進行清算兌現後，收益得以實現。

sentences.english: We shall open a letter of credit in your favour to be settled in US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我們將開立以你方爲收益人的信用證，以美元結算。

sentences.english: Banz (1981) discovered at first the stock cross-section return is deposited in the size effect.
sentences.chinese: 首先研究發現了股票橫截面收益存在規模效應。

definition: to make a profit/to earn a packet
